original_text: Many Pharisees and Sadducees came to John. They wanted John to baptize them. He said to them, ‘You are like dangerous snakes. God is angry. You are trying to run away from him. But he will soon punish people like you.
korean_text: 요한이 많은 바리새인들과 사두개인들이 세례 베푸는 데로 오는 것을 보고 이르되 독사의 자식들아 누가 너희를 가르쳐 임박한 진노를 피하라 하더냐

sentences.original_text: Many Pharisees and Sadducees came to John.
They wanted John to baptize them.
You are trying to run away from him.
But he will soon punish people like you.'
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그가 곧 너희와 같은 사람들을 벌하실 것이다.'
